name: Pro Running Shoes
description: Professional-grade running shoes with advanced cushioning technology. Perfect for marathon training and daily jogging. Features include breathable mesh upper, responsive foam midsole, and durable rubber outsole for maximum traction.

name: Moisture-Wicking T-Shirt
description: Breathable athletic t-shirt designed for high-performance activities with quick-dry technology. Stay cool and dry during your most intense workouts.

name: Sport Watch
description: Smart sports watch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, and 14-day battery life.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat perfect for fitness and meditation. 6mm thick cushioning.

name: Lightweight Backpack
description: Ergonomic sports backpack with multiple compartments and reflective strips for outdoor activities.

name: Compression Socks
description: Medical-grade compression socks for improved circulation during and after workouts.

name: Training Gloves
description: Premium training gloves with wrist support and anti-slip grip for weightlifting and gym training.

name: Water Bottle 1L
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeping drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Silk Evening Dress
description: Elegant silk evening dress perfect for special occasions. Timeless elegance with modern cut.

name: Cashmere Sweater
description: Luxurious pure cashmere sweater in neutral tones. Perfect for layering and everyday wear.

name: Designer Handbag
description: Handcrafted leather handbag with elegant design. Spacious and durable for daily use.
